attributes.action: not bring back the anti-witchcraft laws of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paganism - whether it be in the form of witchcraft, wicca, druidry or some other path - is far older than other religions in this country, and as such should be recognised. As a native pathway of this nation's inhabitants, it should never be outlawed or discriminated against ever again.
